Trustee_17.name: Fatima Ali
Trustee_17.content: My recent allocation plan, which proposed a 70% profit share to the investor and 30% to myself, was rejected due to my low reputation, reflecting concerns regarding my reliability in profit distribution. This rejection adds to a pattern where I have struggled to secure favorable agreements, diminishing my reputation further. My acceptance rate remains critically low at 0.23, indicating significant challenges in proposal appeal and investor trust. Immediate improvements are vital to restore credibility and enhance future investment engagements.
